str2: Simon. Of Hebrew origin; Simon, the name of nine Israelites.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A Canaanite. Of Chaldee origin; zealous; Cananites, an epithet.
Of Hebrew origin; Judas, the name of ten Israelites; also of the posterity of one of them and its region.
Iscariot, surname of Judas. Of Hebrew origin; inhabitant of Kerioth; Iscariotes, an epithet of Judas the traitor.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From para and didomi; to surrender, i.e yield up, intrust, transmit.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
